titleStmt.title: Light vanquishing darknesse. Or a vindication of some truths formerly declared, from those aspersions which have been (by reason of some misapprehensions) cast upon them; now published for the satisfaction and benefit of others. With a preambular epistle to all sorts of men. As also a parcell of good counsell, if you can take it. / By Captain Francis Freeman, a late member of the army.
titleStmt.author: Freeman, Francis.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Includes a letter by Thomas Fairfax.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
